pkgmetadata.longdescription: Idiograms with Marks and Karyotype Indices // Plot idiograms of several karyotypes having a set of data.frames for chromosome data and optionally mark data. Supports micrometers and Mb. Marks can have square or dot form, its legend (label) can be drawn inline or to the right of karyotypes. It is possible to calculate chromosome indices by Levan et al. (1964) doi:10.1111/j.1601-5223.1964.tb01953.x, karyotype indices of Watanabe et al. (1999) doi:10.1007/PL00013869 and Romero-Zarco (1986) doi:10.2307/1221906 and classify chromosomes by morphology Guerra (1986) and Levan et al. (1964).
